content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Wang, I am interested in your offer for the apartment. Please, make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to rent the apartment for 400 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's too low for me, Wang. I am looking for a higher price. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, how about 450 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's still not enough for me, Wang. I can't accept that price. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 480 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a little better, but I'm still looking for a higher price. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer 500 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [500] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Wang. I appreciate your business. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
